description:
Bright, spacious and cozy apartment in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

One of the most vibrant neighborhoods in the city, Williamsburg has everything you'd need to have an amazing visit.

Only minutes from the East Village and Union Square!

I would love to give you some recommendations.

Quiet building in a perfect location.

Wonderful cafes, restaurants, galleries, and vintage shops within minutes of the apartment.

Just 2 blocks from the Bedford Ave. L subway stop!
name: Bright and spacious apartment in the heart of BK
